fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Tradesman: For every trade you make, you may upgrade a single card in the cards you receive.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
*You may only use 2 of these in any given phase.*
- Reforge: Apply Reforge to a card in your hand. [2 uses, 2 CD, Post-Mortem]
- Upgrade: Apply Upgrade to a card in your hand. [2 uses, 4 CD, UOR3, Post-Mortem]
- Satchel: Apply Satchel to a card in your hand. [2 uses, 2 CD, Post-Mortem]
